channel.title: University on Dominik Rys
channel.description: Recent content in University on Dominik Rys

item.title: 10 Tips for Getting a First in a Computer Science Dissertation
item.description: I’m proud to have recently graduated with a First Class BSc degree in Computer Science from the University of Birmingham. To my surprise, during the graduation ceremony, I have also been awarded the Distinguished Dissertation Prize 2020/2021 for the highest-graded dissertation in the graduating cohort. This was a huge honour as it came completely unexpected, and it made a lot of the effort that went into writing my dissertation worthwhile.
